import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../App.css"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Side_component from "./Auth_components"; const Signup = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", age: "", gender: "", uid: "", password: "", c_password: "" }); let name, value const handleInputs = (e) => { console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }); }; const PostDATA = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { Name, Phone, Age, Gender, Email, UserID, Password, CPassword } = user console.log(Name, Phone, Age, Gender, Email, UserID, Password, CPassword) const res = await fetch("/register", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "appliation/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ Name, Phone, Age, Gender, Email, UserID, Password, CPassword }) }) const result = await res.json() console.log(result) if (res.ok) { window.alert("Successful registration") console.log("Successful registration") } else { window.alert("invalid registration") console.log("invalid registration") } } return (
